name: stock-chart-app
description: A real-time chart of active stocks, modifiable from any user via Websockets

scripts.install-build-dependancies: npm install cheerio css-loader dotenv extract-text-webpack-plugin file-loader npm-run-all rimraf style-loader webpack
scripts.uninstall-build-dependancies: npm uninstall cheerio css-loader dotenv extract-text-webpack-plugin file-loader npm-run-all rimraf style-loader webpack
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-build-dependancies && npm run build && npm run uninstall-build-dependancies

author: megaboy101
